entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_droid_factory_jornel_savas.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: I think I'll stay clear of this mess.
entries.s_12: I'll talk to your Lieutenant and see what he has to offer.
entries.s_13: I'm sorry to hear that but I can hardly blame you. Most people wouldn't want to deal with a cave full of trigger happy combat droids.
entries.s_15: Thank you. As I said, you can find him in the Coresec command post inside.
entries.s_16: Ah, you must be the one Agent Taarna talked about. Well I'm glad to see you, we could use a capable individual.
entries.s_18: So what is it that you need from me?
entries.s_20: We've got a real problem here. This cave here seems to contain an old droid factory from the Clone Wars. For some reason it's been reactivated. If you are willing to help, go into the cave and talk to Lieutenant Varias. He'll be in the Corsec command post.
entries.s_21: I don't know who you are but you look like a capable person. If you're looking for some freelance work, talk to Lieutenant Varias at the Corsec command post deeper inside the cave.
entries.s_24: The Lieutenant can give you more information. This cave here seems to contain an old droid factory from the Clone Wars. And for some reason it's been reactivated. If you're willing to help, go into the cave and talk to Lieutenant Varias. He'll be in the Corsec command post.
entries.s_26: I think I'll stay clear of this mess.
entries.s_28: I'm sorry to hear that but I can hardly blame you. Most people wouldn't want to deal with a cave full of trigger happy combat droids.
entries.s_30: I'll talk to your Lieutenant and see what he has to offer.
entries.s_32: Thank you. As I said, you can find him in the Corsec command post inside.
entries.s_34: You'd be smart to get away from here. the area is not safe.
entries.s_4: Welcome back. We appreciate your help in dealing with the droids.
